mutants.original_line: return [round(num + distribution) for num in numbers]
mutants.mutated_line: return [round(num - distribution) for num in numbers]

mutants.original_line: return [round(num + distribution) for num in numbers]
mutants.mutated_line: return [round(num * distribution) for num in numbers]

mutants.original_line: return [round(num * reduction_ratio) for num in numbers]
mutants.mutated_line: return [round(num / reduction_ratio) for num in numbers]

mutants.original_line: return [round(num * reduction_ratio) for num in numbers]
mutants.mutated_line: return [round(num + reduction_ratio) for num in numbers]

mutants.original_line: return [round(num * reduction_ratio) for num in numbers]
mutants.mutated_line: return [round(num ** reduction_ratio) for num in numbers]
